title: Ratking666's Author Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

I have made my decision to depart from the wiki entirely. I will not be posting any more articles. Thank you for understanding. I'm still deciding on what I want the future of my works on this site to be, so please be patient. It'll take some time.

[https://ratkingsblog.blogspot.com/ I recently made a blog if you want to check that out.]
------
Hello, my name is Ratking. I am a cartoon character and I like to draw and write. I wanted to update my author page into something incredibly simple until I am able to revamp it. If you want to see my old author page, look into the history. Here's the main things I've uploaded to the site.

**Skips I've Made**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5045 SCP-5045 - You Get Used to It] (w/ [[*user Westrin]] and [[*user ValidClay]]) 

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6080 SCP-6080 - Cartoon Network] (w/ [[*user ValidClay]] and [[*user JackalRelated]])

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6869 SCP-6869 - The sad man]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7664 SCP-7664 - No One Has to Know] **(NSFW)**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8060 SCP-8060 - Toontown] (w/ [[*user Monkeysky]])

------

**Tales I've Made**


[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/michael-the-kiler michael the kiler]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/erics-mega-zine-vol-50-the-cutout-room ERICS MEGA ZINE VOL 50: THE CUTOUT ROOM] (w/ [[*user faminepulse]])

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-francis Critter Profile: Francis!]

------

**My Canon Hub**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/but-a-dream But A Dream Hub] (w/ [[*user FLOORBOARDS]]

------

**Outdated Art Pages**[[footnote]]pastarasta1 was my early username. Also, these pages aren't representative of how my artwork looks nowadays.[[/footnote]]


[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/pastarasta1-s-simply-epic-artpage pastarasta1's simply epic artpage archive]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-pastarasta1-art-page-experience-rise-of-the-revenge-of-r The Pastarasta1 Art Page Experience: Rise Of The Revenge Of Ruiz Duchamp (ALMOST DIED!)]
author: ratking666
